content.question: Which of the following represents the rhythm sounded?

choices.label: The figure presents a staff with a bass clef. There is no key signature. The time signature is of three four time. There are two measures. The rhythm in measure one is: quarter note, eighth note eighth note, sixteenth note, sixteenth note, eighth note. The pitches are: B flat 2, D 3, F 3, E flat 3, C 3 and A 2. The rhythm in measure two is: Half note. The pitch of the note is: Dotted B flat 2.

The figure presents a bass staff. There is no key signature. The time signature is of three four time. There are two measures. The rhythm in measure one is: dotted eighth note, sixteenth note, eighth note, eighth note with a tie to sixteenth note, sixteenth note, eighth note. The pitches are: B flat 2, D 3, F 3, E flat 3 tied to E flat 3, C 3 and A 2. The rhythm in measure two is: dotted half note. The pitch is B flat 2.

The figure presents a bass staff. There is no key signature. The time signature is of three four time. There are two measures. The rhythm in measure one is: eighth note, sixteenth note, sixteenth note, eighth note, eighth note, quarter note. The pitches are: B flat 2, D 3, F 3, E flat 3, C 3 and A. The rhythm in measure two is: dotted half note. The pitch is B flat 2.

The figure presents a bass staff. There is no key signature. The time signature is of three four time. There are two measures. The rhythm in measure one is: Dotted eighth note, sixteenth note, dotted eighth note, sixteenth note, eighth note and eighth note. The pitches are: B flat 2, D 3, F 3, E flat 3, C 3 and A 2. The rhythm in measure two is a dotted half note. The pitch is B flat 2.

content.answer: The figure presents a staff with a bass clef. There is no key signature. The time signature is of three four time. There are two measures. The rhythm in measure one is: quarter note, eighth note eighth note, sixteenth note, sixteenth note, eighth note. The pitches are: B flat 2, D 3, F 3, E flat 3, C 3 and A 2. The rhythm in measure two is: Half note. The pitch of the note is: Dotted B flat 2.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
